description:
Mayu was a http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghoul] who preyed on men by crushing their testicles before drinking the fluids. She was tasked with capturing humans for an underground Gourmet society.
With the http://anidb.net/ch95692 [Torso] investigation put on hold, the http://anidb.net/ch95829 [Quinx Squad] was reassigned to assist the http://anidb.net/ch95743 [Suzuya Squad] with her case. During their meeting, her identity had been uncovered. However, because of her involvement in a human trafficking ring and links to a Gourmet society, they decided to simply observe her. They learned that she was seeking targets in the 13th Ward, for an upcoming Auction.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Mayu
